title: Norrie & Fery put GB in control in Davis Cup tie
summary: Cameron Norrie and Arthur Fery won their Davis Cup matches to give Great Britain a 2-0 lead over Poland and a strong chance of reaching next year's qualifiers.

title: 'Magnificent' Buttler innings puts England on course for huge total
